name: Amro Awad
content: SACA - Home Secure and Advanced Computer Architecture (SACA) Toggle navigation Home Members News Publications Impact Research Join SACA? Contact Previous Next Welcome to SACA SACA has moved to Oxford under the name of OSCAR. Check out www.oscar-ox.com For more information, please feel free to contact us. Our Sponsors: News June 6th, 2022 Kazi successfully defended his PhD dissertation and will be joining Intel as a CPU Architect. Congrats, Kazi! December 13th, 2021 Transpose-Xen is accepted in SAC'22. Congrats, John! December 10th, 2021 Our work on secure memory metadata handling in disaggregated systems is accepted in IPDPS'22. Congrats, Mazen! October 27th, 2021 Our work on rethinking filesystem encryption in the area of emerging NVMs is accepted in HPCA'22. Congrats, Kazi! July 14th, 2021 Three papers accepted in the International Symposium on Microarchitecture (MICRO'21). Congrats, Kazi, Xijing and Ryad! April 23rd, 2021 Our ProMT paper is accepted in ICS'21 and is a best paper candidate. Congrats, Mazen! April 5th, 2021 Vamsee defended his PhD dissertation, and joining AMD Research. Congrats, Vamsee! October 27, 2020 Two papers accepted in HPCA'21. Congrats Vamsee and Mazen! June 15, 2020 SACA group is moving to North Carolina State University in Fall'20 ... see all News Â© 2018 SACA Group. Site made with Jekyll; copy and modify it for your own research group. We are part of the College of Engineering at the North Carolina State University. Our Sponsors: Contact: To reach us, please email Dr. Awad at ajawad@ncsu.edu
